title: Don't Be Running in Here Wrong
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss the contract stipulations that are present in Zion Williamson and Kyler Murrary's contracts and what that means for their development as young players. Also, they discuss if Jaylen Brown should be offended that the Celtics put him in trade talks for Kevin Durant, and if they should be more willing to trade Jayson Tatum. Plus, Swagu has a bone to pick with the anonymous defensive coach who put out statements about Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson. Tune In!
